sentences.en: Before too long he started involving me in the more confidential aspects of the job.
sentences.cn: 不久，他便开始让我介入工作中更机密的方面。

sentences.en: Doctors are required to keep patients’ records completely confidential .
sentences.cn: 医生必须对病人的病历完全保密。

sentences.en: Don't become too confidential with strangers.
From time to time he passed on confidential information to him.
sentences.cn: 他时不时告诉他一些机密信息。

sentences.en: His face suddenly turned solemn, his voice confidential.
sentences.cn: 他脸上的神情突然严肃起来，声音也压低了。

sentences.en: Please lock up these confidential reports.
sentences.cn: 请把这些机密报告锁起来.

sentences.en: Police are investigating the disappearance from council offices of confidential files.
sentences.cn: 警察正在调查市政办公室机密档案被盗一案。

sentences.en: She accused them of leaking confidential information about her private life.
sentences.cn: 她指责他们泄露其私生活的秘密。

sentences.en: The charity says the journalists appear to have obtained confidential documents in an unorthodox manner.
sentences.cn: 慈善机构称那些记者似乎以非正常手段取得了秘密文件。

sentences.en: The information in my possession is strictly confidential.
sentences.cn: 我掌握的情报是绝对机密的.

sentences.en: The information will be regarded as strictly confidential (= completely confidential ) .
sentences.cn: 这一信息将被视为绝对机密。

sentences.en: The results of conference are still confidential.
The two parties encode confidential data in a form that is not directly readable by the other party.
sentences.cn: 双方将机密资料加密，这样对方就无法直接读取资料。

sentences.en: We have a confidential exchange of views.
sentences.cn: 我们推心置腹地交换意见.

sentences.en: We'll take good care and keep what you've told us strictly confidential, Mr. Lane.
sentences.cn: 莱恩先生，我们会非常小心，对您告诉我们的事严格保密。

phrases.tran_cn: 机密数据；保密资料；机密资料

trans.tran_en: spoken or written in secret and intended to be kept secret
